oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Population Approach to Assess Antimicrobial Resistance in Commensal Coliforms of Feedlot Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Epperson, W. B.
Pritchard, R. H.
Gates, C. E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: antimicrobial resistance
fecal coliforms
feedlot
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to determine the magnitude and duration of apparent antimicrobial resistance in commensal fecal coliforms using a population-based approach in feedlot cattle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2002; 259
